attributes.action: Increase the pay of Civil Servants to enable an acceptable standard of living
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Most Civil Servants in the U.K are paid little more than a minimum wage.

This petition addresses the unjust pay system for those who provide a service to their country and receive little or no recognition of this.  The government are currently in the process of cutting many valued services, including care for the old.  


Please add your name to this petition, without your support there is little chance that there will be any anything left of the Civil Service in 10 years time.  Instead all the valid services will be delivered by hundreds of companies, who's only agenda is profit and more profit.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Increase the pay of Civil Servants to enable an acceptable standard of living."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page12871.asp

Prime Minister's Office
